6// mtl_utils.h:
7// Declares utilities functions that create Metal shaders, convert from angle enums
8// to Metal enums and so on.
9//
10
11#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_MTL_UTILS_H_
12#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_MTL_UTILS_H_
13
14#import <Metal/Metal.h>
15
16#include "angle_gl.h"
17#include "common/PackedEnums.h"
18#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
19#include "libANGLE/Texture.h"
20#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_format_utils.h"
21#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_resources.h"
22#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_state_cache.h"
23
24namespace rx
25{
26
27class ContextMtl;
28
29namespace mtl
30{
31
32NS_ASSUME_NONNULL_BEGIN
33
34// Initialize texture content to black.
35angle::Result InitializeTextureContents(const gl::Context *context,
36 const TextureRef &texture,
37 const Format &textureObjFormat,
38 const ImageNativeIndex &index);
39// Same as above but using GPU clear operation instead of CPU.
40// - channelsToInit parameter controls which channels will get their content initialized.
41angle::Result InitializeTextureContentsGPU(const gl::Context *context,
42 const TextureRef &texture,
43 const Format &textureObjFormat,
44 const ImageNativeIndex &index,
45 MTLColorWriteMask channelsToInit);
46
47// Same as above but for a depth/stencil texture.
48angle::Result InitializeDepthStencilTextureContentsGPU(const gl::Context *context,
49 const TextureRef &texture,
50 const Format &textureObjFormat,
51 const ImageNativeIndex &index);
52
53// Unified texture's per slice/depth texel reading function
54angle::Result ReadTexturePerSliceBytes(const gl::Context *context,
55 const TextureRef &texture,
56 size_t bytesPerRow,
57 const gl::Rectangle &fromRegion,
58 const MipmapNativeLevel &mipLevel,
59 uint32_t sliceOrDepth,
60 uint8_t *dataOut);
61
62angle::Result ReadTexturePerSliceBytesToBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
63 const TextureRef &texture,
64 size_t bytesPerRow,
65 const gl::Rectangle &fromRegion,
66 const MipmapNativeLevel &mipLevel,
67 uint32_t sliceOrDepth,
68 uint32_t dstOffset,
69 const BufferRef &dstBuffer);
70
71MTLViewport GetViewport(const gl::Rectangle &rect, double znear = 0, double zfar = 1);
72MTLViewport GetViewportFlipY(const gl::Rectangle &rect,
73 NSUInteger screenHeight,
74 double znear = 0,
75 double zfar = 1);
76MTLViewport GetViewport(const gl::Rectangle &rect,
77 NSUInteger screenHeight,
78 bool flipY,
79 double znear = 0,
80 double zfar = 1);
81MTLScissorRect GetScissorRect(const gl::Rectangle &rect,
82 NSUInteger screenHeight = 0,
83 bool flipY = false);
84
85uint32_t GetDeviceVendorId(id<MTLDevice> metalDevice);
86
87
88AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLLibrary>> CreateShaderLibrary(id<MTLDevice> metalDevice,
89 const std::string &source,
90 NSDictionary<NSString *, NSObject *> * substitutionDictionary,
91 AutoObjCPtr<NSError *> *error);
92
93AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLLibrary>> CreateShaderLibrary(id<MTLDevice> metalDevice,
94 const std::string &source,
95 AutoObjCPtr<NSError *> *error);
96
97AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLLibrary>> CreateShaderLibrary(id<MTLDevice> metalDevice,
98 const char *source,
99 size_t sourceLen,
100 NSDictionary<NSString *, NSObject *> * substitutionDictionary,
101 AutoObjCPtr<NSError *> *error);
102
103AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLLibrary>> CreateShaderLibraryFromBinary(id<MTLDevice> metalDevice,
104 const uint8_t *binarySource,
105 size_t binarySourceLen,
106 NSDictionary<NSString *, NSObject *> * substitutionDictionary,
107 AutoObjCPtr<NSError *> *error);
108
109bool SupportsIOSGPUFamily(id<MTLDevice> device, uint8_t iOSFamily);
110
111bool SupportsMacGPUFamily(id<MTLDevice> device, uint8_t macFamily);
112
113// Need to define invalid enum value since Metal doesn't define it
114constexpr MTLTextureType MTLTextureTypeInvalid = static_cast<MTLTextureType>(NSUIntegerMax);
115static_assert(sizeof(MTLTextureType) == sizeof(NSUInteger),
116 "MTLTextureType is supposed to be based on NSUInteger");
117
118constexpr MTLPrimitiveType MTLPrimitiveTypeInvalid = static_cast<MTLPrimitiveType>(NSUIntegerMax);
119static_assert(sizeof(MTLPrimitiveType) == sizeof(NSUInteger),
120 "MTLPrimitiveType is supposed to be based on NSUInteger");
121
122constexpr MTLIndexType MTLIndexTypeInvalid = static_cast<MTLIndexType>(NSUIntegerMax);
123static_assert(sizeof(MTLIndexType) == sizeof(NSUInteger),
124 "MTLIndexType is supposed to be based on NSUInteger");
125
126MTLTextureType GetTextureType(gl::TextureType glType);
127
128MTLSamplerMinMagFilter GetFilter(GLenum filter);
129MTLSamplerMipFilter GetMipmapFilter(GLenum filter);
130MTLSamplerAddressMode GetSamplerAddressMode(GLenum wrap);
131
132MTLBlendFactor GetBlendFactor(GLenum factor);
133MTLBlendOperation GetBlendOp(GLenum op);
134
135MTLCompareFunction GetCompareFunc(GLenum func);
136MTLStencilOperation GetStencilOp(GLenum op);
137
138MTLWinding GetFontfaceWinding(GLenum frontFaceMode, bool invert);
139
140PrimitiveTopologyClass GetPrimitiveTopologyClass(gl::PrimitiveMode mode);
141MTLPrimitiveType GetPrimitiveType(gl::PrimitiveMode mode);
142MTLIndexType GetIndexType(gl::DrawElementsType type);
143
144#if ANGLE_MTL_SWIZZLE_AVAILABLE
145MTLTextureSwizzle GetTextureSwizzle(GLenum swizzle);
146#endif
147
148// Get color write mask for a specified format. Some formats such as RGB565 doesn't have alpha
149// channel but is emulated by a RGBA8 format, we need to disable alpha write for this format.
150// - emulatedChannelsOut: if the format is emulated, this pointer will store a true value.
151MTLColorWriteMask GetEmulatedColorWriteMask(const mtl::Format &mtlFormat,
152 bool *emulatedChannelsOut);
153MTLColorWriteMask GetEmulatedColorWriteMask(const mtl::Format &mtlFormat);
154bool IsFormatEmulated(const mtl::Format &mtlFormat);
155
156NSUInteger GetMaxRenderTargetSizeForDeviceInBytes(id<MTLDevice> device);
157NSUInteger GetMaxNumberOfRenderTargetsForDevice(id<MTLDevice> device);
158bool DeviceHasMaximumRenderTargetSize(id<MTLDevice> device);
159
160// Useful to set clear color for texture originally having no alpha in GL, but backend's format
161// has alpha channel.
162MTLClearColor EmulatedAlphaClearColor(MTLClearColor color, MTLColorWriteMask colorMask);
163
164
165NSUInteger ComputeTotalSizeUsedForMTLRenderPassDescriptor(const MTLRenderPassDescriptor *descriptor,
166 const Context *context,
167 id<MTLDevice> device);
168
169NSUInteger ComputeTotalSizeUsedForMTLRenderPipelineDescriptor(
170 const MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor *descriptor,
171 const Context *context,
172 id<MTLDevice> device);
173
174gl::Box MTLRegionToGLBox(const MTLRegion &mtlRegion);
175
176MipmapNativeLevel GetNativeMipLevel(GLuint level, GLuint base);
177GLuint GetGLMipLevel(const MipmapNativeLevel &nativeLevel, GLuint base);
178
179angle::Result TriangleFanBoundCheck(ContextMtl *context, size_t numTris);
180
181angle::Result GetTriangleFanIndicesCount(ContextMtl *context,
182 GLsizei vetexCount,
183 uint32_t *numElemsOut);
184
185angle::Result CreateMslShader(Context *context,
186 id<MTLLibrary> shaderLib,
187 NSString * shaderName,
188 MTLFunctionConstantValues *funcConstants,
189 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLFunction>> *shaderOut);
190
191angle::Result CreateMslShader(Context * _Nonnull context,
192 id<MTLLibrary> shaderLib,
193 NSString * _Nonnull shaderName,
194 MTLFunctionConstantValues * _Nullable funcConstants,
195 id<MTLFunction> _Nullable * _Nonnull shaderOut);
196
197NS_ASSUME_NONNULL_END
198} // namespace mtl
199} // namespace rx
200
201#endif /* LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_MTL_UTILS_H_ */
